enabled.description: If enabled, then credit union can access Views/AccountOpening.cshtml and the features that accompany it

minVersion.description: Minimum version for this feature to run

onlySendEmailOnNewAccountCreation.description: Whether to only send email notifications for new account creation

hideContactInfoDuringSubAccountOpening.description: If true, enable the hiding of the 'contact info' area on the new sub account opening page in HomeBanking
